Package ca.ualberta.cs.phebert.litx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UserObserver
    Observes a user and acts as soon as one is modified
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBookActivity
    AddBookActivity takes the entered information and if valid, creates a new book object from them once the okay button gets clicked.
    AuthorClient
    Searches an online database for the author of a book
    Book
    Book object, has a title, author, isbn and other fields to know where it is in the database
    BookClient
    This is our BookClient class this is used by scan to find search results from our ISBN
    BookListAdapter
    Based Source: http://www.sanktips.com/2017/11/15/android-recyclerview-with-custom-adapter-example/
    BookStatusActivity
    Displays all books the user has of the status they selected (Requested, Accepted, Borrowed)
    BookTest  
    BookViewActivity
    Displays the description of a book after a user selected the book to view in the previous screen
    ExchangeActivity
    Screen where users can exchange their books
    LoadingScreenActivity
    Creates a simple splash screen that gets displayed while we retrieve information from the database, without this the screen just appears blank while starting up
    MainActivity
    Main screen of the app, lots of navigation done from here, displays the top 10 books
    MainActivityTest  
    MapActivity
    Allows the Owner of a book to set a location that will be attached to that book and has the requestor of that book be able to see the location
    MapTest  
    MyBooksActivity
    MyBooksActivity displays the books this user owns, and allows the user to select a book to view or add a new book
    MyBooksActivityTest  
    MyBooksTest  
    MyGlideApp
    This class is simply for loading an image out of Firebase Storage using Glide, it is a required class by Glide and was gotten from Firebase Storage site
    NotificationIntentService
    Background thread for notifications
    ProfileActivity
    This Activity is used to display a user's information.
    ProfileActivityTest  
    Request
    Request object for a book, contains the book, book owner and user that is requesting the book
    RequestListAdapter
    An array adapter for the request object
    RequestTest  
    ScanBookActivity
    This is our ScanBookActivity class
    ScannerTest  
    SearchActivity
    Allows users to search all books for the book they want, they can search by title, author, isbn or a combination of them
    SearchActivityTest  
    TopTenAdapter
    Adapter for the top ten Books
    User
    Represents the various users using the app.
    UserTest  
    ViewPhotoActivity
    Activity for viewing a photo when selected from the view book activity.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BookStatus  
    RequestStatus
